attributes.action: award all ex armed forces personnel a pension based on the length of their service at the age of Sixty Five.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are many people who served their country but did not complete a full Twenty Two years prior to the present pension scheme being introduced back in the 1970's who at this present time receive nothing from the government for the services they rendered.
These men and women should now be awarded a pension no matter when they served their country in the past.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
